examples.example: 我会认真处理好每一件事情，让大家都满意。

translate.english: I will handle every thing carefully to make everyone satisfied.

examples.example: 他总是能够妥善处理各种复杂的问题。

translate.english: He is always able to properly handle all kinds of complex problems.

examples.example: 当遇到困难时，他总能冷静地处理，找到最佳解决办法。

translate.english: When encountering difficulties, he can always deal with them calmly and find the best solution.
